post:
We proudly present before you, BGSA Web Hosting offers new simple infrastructured VPS include OpenVZ and Xen virtualization with [url="http://www.ksplice.com"]Ksplice Uptrack[/url] keeping our server nodes up to date without reboots.

***Network/Infrastructure***
We operate US and Europe locations to get closer target audience with the lowest latency server response time.

Nehterlands: 64.214.147.46
US, Seatle: 208.76.153.38


***Linux OpenVZ:***

Duo VPS 0
- 1 Core
- 128MB DDR3 Dedicated RAM
- 256MB Burst RAM
- 15GB Hard Disk 
- 200GB Bandwidth
- 1 IP Address
- Self-Managed
Price: $4.95 / month

Order NOW: [bgsawebhosting.com/openvzvps.php](http://www.bgsawebhosting.com/openvzvps.php)


***Linux Xen-PV:***

Xeon VPS 0
- 1 Core
- 128MB DDR3 Dedicated RAM
- 256MB Swap RAM
- 15GB Hard Disk 
- 200GB Bandwidth
- 1 IP Address
- Self-Managed
Price: $6.95 / month

Order NOW: [https://bgsawebhosting.com/xenvps.php](https://www.bgsawebhosting.com/xenvps.php)


Addons:
Extra IP: $2 / Month
Extra 10GB Bandwidth: $1 / Month
Extra 1GB Space: $1 / Month
Extra 128MB Memory: $5 / Month

Discounts:
Use SMR50OFF to get 50% OFF for first month only
Use SMR10OFF to get 10% OFF monthly recurring

Payments:
You can order from our website and pay with debit/credit card or paypal using 2Checkout, AlertPay and MoneyBookers/Skrill, accounts are setup instantly after payment made. We also accept manual payment like GCash, SmartMoney, Xoom and Bank Deposit (UNIONBANK) for local customer here in Philppines.

**NOTE:** all orders are subject to fraud check by Maxmind

Contact:
Email: [sales@bgsawebhosting.com](sales@bgsawebhosting.com)
